Our current currencies

Two currencies are currently in use within the borders of our country, a physical one, as well as a virtual currency to strengthen the influence of our country on the internet, the TCD (TetraCoin Dollar).



Avaible on the Goerli blockchain, this cryptomoney is only obtainable in physical dedicated centers everywhere in the country, however once it has been acquired, it can be exchanged with any of the main cryptocurrencies. All the sellers in the country must be able to accept it and can exchange it back in our dedicated centers. The goal of this currency is to simplify transactions, in consequence multiple securities have been created to avoid speculation and maintain a exchange rate as stable as possible.
